title: Radiation Biol& Oncology
description: Radiation lesions and repair, mechanisms of cell death, cell cycle effect, radiation sensitizers and protectors, tumor radiobiology, relative sensitivities of human tissues, and radiation carcinogenesis.

prerequisites: NRE 6756 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or HP 6756 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
